created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Dan Beavin), oscd.community
name: HH.exe Execution
description: Identifies usage of hh.exe executing recently modified .chm files.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\hh.exe AND process.command_line:*.chm*)`
